column1: Master in Environmental Management and Sustainable Science
column5: The Master’s Programme in Urban, Energy and Environmental Planning with specialisation in Environmental Management and Sustainability Science at Aalborg University, is directed at science and engineering students who are interested in topics related to sustainability and environmental management.LEARN ABOUTEnvironmental ManagementSustainability ScienceAre you interested in how companies and societies can become more sustainable? In this programme you are given flexibility to design your own strong profile within Environmental Management and Sustainability Science.
